title: About Me
text:
My current interests are in applying data science, machine learning and geospatial applications for sustainability solutions.
Or at least that’s what I tell myself, hahah.

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
Its a new year! And this is the first post in my brand new shiny Quarto blog. Welcome!

Not much to say for now. (Yeah, the pic’s also from Stable Diffusion Web, not as nice as the Sunrise pic, but hey – it only takes a few minutes to generate1 , plus I’m pretty sure its not copied from somewhere else.)
Have you eaten yet?




Footnotes


Prompt:“busy office table, photorealistic, with a laptop and mouse on the side, wood panel, beautiful, restful, hyperrealistic coffee mug”.
Negative prompt: “stationary, pen, cell phone”↩︎

title: Revival and Renewal
text:
This is my umpteenth time to refresh my blog (or rather, revive – its been dead for the last two years).

This time using Quarto.
Let’s see – in the past I’ve used Jekyll (sometime until 2015) and Hugo (until recently).
I like it, its simple but still has enough features to match many blog site apps.
As for the image, guess what: it’s from Stable Diffusion Web, using this prompt “sunrise, dawn of a new age, hyperrealistic, horizon, photorealism”
